attributes.action: Knight Mr Partis for services to comedy......
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr partis has provided us with some of the best howlers this country has ever seen. He should be rewarded

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
